description:
Vovsoft Clipboard Reader is a Windows software that allows you to convert any text to speech with just a click. With this clipboard speaker program, you can listen to whatever text you copy to your clipboard.

Vovsoft Clipboard Reader is a Windows software that allows you to convert any text to speech with just a click. With this clipboard speaker program, you can listen to whatever text you copy to your clipboard. It is an ideal tool for anyone who wants to listen to articles, documents, emails, or any other text content without having to read it.

With a variety of voices and languages to choose from, you can customize your listening experience to match your preferences. Clipboard Reader is an excellent productivity tool that can save you time and effort, allowing you to work on other tasks while important information is read aloud to you.

The software offers all essential functionalities:
- Click the "Read" button to manually speak the clipboard contents.
- Click the "Stop" button to stop the reading process immediately.
- Enable the "Read Automatically" option to have the software read whenever clipboard contents change.
- Give it a try and experience the convenience of having your clipboard text transformed into speech.
